mapper.select: SELECT MBER_INFO_IDX as "IDX", MBER_PHONE as "PHONE", MBER_LOCAL as "LOCAL", MBER_SKILL as "SKILL", MBER_INTRODUCE as "INTRODUCE", MBER_IMG as "IMG" FROM MBER_INFO WHERE MBER_INFO_IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.sql: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MI.MBER_INFO_IDX DESC) RNUM, MI.*, M.MBER_NAME FROM MBER M, MBER_INFO MI WHERE M.MBER_EMAIL = MI.MBER_EMAIL
mapper.select: AND M.MBER_DEL = 'N' AND MI.MBER_INFO_DEL = 'N' ORDER BY MI.MBER_INFO_IDX DESC
